author: Brian Schwartz
title: Former Trump officials dined with Zelensky reps at Trump hotel months before phone call
description: Former Trump administration officials had contact with Volodymyr Zelensky's team at the Trump International Hotel before the now infamous phone between Donald Trump and the new president of the Ukraine.
content:
Before President Donald Trump's controversial phone call with the president of the Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky's closest advisors established contact with Washington, D.C., power players, including former senior administration officials.
Prior to their elect… [+5507 chars]
